title: Sell Miyagikyo Whisky
metaTitle: Sell Nikka Miyagikyo Whisky | Age Statements & Single Casks | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Have Miyagikyo 10, 12, or 15 Year Old? We buy discontinued Nikka Miyagikyo whisky and limited single cask releases.
heroSubhead: Buying discontinued Miyagikyo age statements and rare single casks.
introParagraph: Miyagikyo creates a softer, more floral profile than its brother Yoichi. The discontinued age statements are now highly prized by collectors.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Standard 'Single Malt Miyagikyo' NAS (unless in volume)
conditionFactors: Discontinued Verification: Confirming it is the old label style
Fill Level: Into neck or better
pricingFactors: Age Statement: 15 and 12 year are the key value drivers
Flavor Profile Series: The 'Key Malt' series (Sherry & Sweet etc) is collectible
Single Cask: Vintage dated single casks are the highest value tier

faqs.question: Do you buy the 'Key Malt' series?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy Sherry & Sweet, Fruity & Rich, and Malty & Soft bottlings.

faqs.question: Is the new NAS Miyagikyo valuable?
faqs.answer: It is readily available in stores, so secondary market value is lower.

faqs.question: What is a 'Single Cask'?
faqs.answer: It means the whisky came from one specific barrel. The label will list a Cask # and Bottle #.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 500ml bottles?
faqs.answer: Yes, common for older Japanese releases. We purchase them.

faqs.question: How do I ship it?
faqs.answer: We provide prepaid shipping labels and insurance. See our Packing Guide.

faqs.question: Do you buy Nikka Coffey Grain?
